<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get status of Camunda License</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/license"}></MethodEndpoint>

Obtains the status of the current Camunda License

## Request

<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Obtains the current status of the Camunda license

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"validLicense"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"True if the Camunda License is valid, false if otherwise","type":"boolean","nullable":false}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"licenseType"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Will return the license type property of the Camunda License","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"validLicense\": true,\n  \"licenseType\": \"string\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
